name: Apprentice
ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).

legacy.firstNightReminder: Show the Apprentice a Townsfolk token (if good) or Minion token (if evil). The Apprentice gains that ability.

firstNight.description: You gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).

information.customMessage: Gain a Townsfolk or Minion ability based on alignment.
